Luggage Tag with Personalized Message: Offer customizable luggage tags with space for a personalized message, such as the owner's name, contact information, or travel itinerary. This feature would be especially useful for frequent travelers or those embarking on extended journeys.

Luggage Tag with Built-in USB Charging Port: Incorporate a USB charging port into the luggage tag, allowing travelers to conveniently charge their devices while on the go. This feature would be particularly useful for those who need to keep their devices charged during long layovers or when power outlets are not readily available.

Luggage Tag with Built-in Camera: Integrate a small, high-resolution camera into the luggage tag. This would allow travelers to capture memorable moments or document their journey without having to carry a separate camera or rely on their phone.

Luggage Tag with RFID Tracking: Implement RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) technology in the luggage tag for more efficient and secure tracking. This would allow airports and other transportation hubs to quickly identify and locate the luggage, reducing the risk of theft or loss.

Luggage Tag with Integrated Lock: Incorporate a small, portable lock into the luggage tag, allowing travelers to secure their belongings without needing to carry a separate lock. This would be particularly useful for travelers in areas with high crime rates or when carrying valuable items.
